name: SuperRocketBall2 Real Football
description:
Soccer meets driving once again in the long-awaited, physics-based sequel to the Super Rocketball - Multiplayer with over 50 Million downloads across all platform

A futuristic Sports-Action game, Super RocketBall 2 Soccer Star, equips world wide players with rocket booster-rigged vehicles that can be smashed into balls for incredible goals or epic saves across unique and highly-detailed arenas. Using an advanced physics system to simulate realistic interactions, Super RocketBall 2 relies on weight and velocity to give all the players a complete sense of intuitive control in this unbelievable, high-tech all new aera of football.

Super RocketBall 2 has two to six players assigned to each of the two teams, using rocket-powered vehicles to hit a ball into their opponent's goal and score points over the course of a match. Choose from a variety of high-flying vehicles equipped with huge rocket boosters to score amazing aerial goals and pull off incredible, game-changing saves!

You are fan of Lionel Messi, Cristiano Ronaldo, Xavi, Andres Iniesta, Zlatan Ibrahimovic, Radamel Falcao, Robin van Persie and finding Football game then this game is only for you.

This action packed game brings the worlds best players into the football field. Get in your favorite car and go out on the soccer field like a rocket to hit the ball. This game is a must play for everyone who likes to play unique football games, challenging soccer games or even car driving or car battle.

Awesome Game Features :

* 8 Unique Design High Speed Rocket Cars
* Tonnes of car customization options which includes car body color,window color,neon,wheels,rims,stickers and lot more
* 8 incredible and fantastic stadium designs
* Simple and user friendly user interface


UNIQUE MULTIPLAYER FEATURES :
* Play with your social media friends and connect to them in single touch
* Create your clan and challange other clans
* Join high speed servers from all over the world
* Ability to create private and public rooms
* Cross platform connectivity
* Unique features like kick player from room or make someone a host
* Live chat in lobby and in gameplay

Game comes with following 3 UNIQUE modes:
RUMBLE MODE :
Rumble is an epic battle royale-style addition that comes stacked with randomized power-ups like boot,punch,freezer,hook,plunger,spike etc. Join with your friends and team up to this battle royale style football match.

CROSSFIRE MODE :
In crossfire mode everyone is for himself. Play against not just 1 but 3 other rivals and all the players are an individual teams. Challenge your friends in this mode and show them who is one man squad.

BASKETBALL MODE :
As the name suggest, basketball mode is high tech car basketball game where you team up with other players and show your basketball skills


So just join with the best players around the globe and DOMINATE the battle ground.
